UsersPage.title: User Management
UsersPage.subtitle: Manage all users in the system

Dashboard.my_inventories_description: Inventories that you own and manage.
Dashboard.no_inventories: It looks a bit empty here. Get started by creating your first inventory.
Dashboard.no_shared_inventories: It looks a bit empty here. When someone shares an inventory with you, it will show up here.
Dashboard.no_my_inventories: It looks a bit empty here. Get started by creating your first inventory.

AllInventories.title: All Inventories
AllInventories.description: Browse all inventories in the platform.

InventoryTable.no_inventories: It looks a bit empty here. Get started by creating your first inventory.
InventoryTable.name: Name

InventoryCreateDialog.title: Create Inventory
InventoryCreateDialog.description: Give your new inventory a name to get started. You can change this later.
InventoryCreateDialog.description_placeholder: Enter a description for your inventory...
InventoryCreateDialog.visibility_description: Allow all users to view and contribute to this inventory

ItemsActions.no_items: This inventory is empty. Add an item to get started.

ItemCreateDialog.title: Add Item
ItemCreateDialog.description: Add a new item in the inventory.
ItemCreateDialog.failure_message: Failed to create item. Please try again.

ItemEditDialog.title: Edit Item
ItemEditDialog.description: Update the details for this item.
ItemEditDialog.failure_message: Failed to update item. Please try again.

ItemDeleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
ItemDeleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the item(s). This action cannot be undone.
ItemDeleteDialog.failure_message: Failed to delete item(s). Please try again.
ItemDeleteDialog.no_access_message: You don't have permission to delete this inventory

DiscussionList.no_discussions_yet: No comments here yet. Post a comment to get started.

InventorySettingsForm.description_placeholder: A short description of this inventory.
InventorySettingsForm.danger_zone_description: Permanently delete this inventory and all of its items.
InventorySettingsForm.visibility_description: Allow all users to view and contribute to this inventory

InventoryDeleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
InventoryDeleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this inventory and all of its items. This action cannot be undone.

IDPreview.preview_description: Example of what your Custom IDs will look like.
IDPreview.preview_note: This is a sample preview. Actual values will vary.

FieldList.noFieldsMessage: No custom fields yet. Add one to get started.

FieldDeleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
FieldDeleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the field. This action cannot be undone.
FieldDeleteDialog.failure_message: Failed to delete field. Please try again.

CustomFieldsEditor.title: Existing Fields
CustomFieldsEditor.field_description_placeholder: Enter a description for this field...
CustomFieldsEditor.show_in_table_description: Display this field as a column in the items table.
CustomFieldsEditor.field_type_edit_disabled: Field type cannot be changed after creation.
CustomFieldsEditor.field_description_help: Provide additional context about this field for users.

AccessPages.title: Collaborators
AccessPages.visibility_public_desc: This inventory is public and can be viewed by anyone.
AccessPages.visibility_private_desc: This inventory is private and only accessible to collaborators.

AccessInviteDialog.title: Add Collaborator
AccessInviteDialog.description: Select a user and assign a role to invite them to this inventory.
AccessInviteDialog.failure_message: Failed to add user. Please try again.
AccessInviteDialog.no_user_selected: Please select a user and role.

AccessRemoveDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
AccessRemoveDialog.description: This will remove the user's access to this inventory. This action cannot be undone.

StatisticsPage.no_data_message: No statistics available for this inventory.
StatisticsPage.total_quantity_placeholder: Add a 'Quantity' field to see this stat.
StatisticsPage.avg_price_placeholder: Add a 'Price' field to see this stat.
StatisticsPage.avg_quantity_placeholder: Add a 'Quantity' field to see this stat.
StatisticsPage.visualize_more_data_description: Add a custom field named 'Quantity' to this inventory to see a distribution chart.

Explore.title: Explore Public Inventories
Explore.description: Discover inventories that have been shared publicly by other users.

Shared.title: Shared With Me
Shared.description: Private inventories that other users have shared with you.

NotFound.title: Whoops! Wrong Turn.
NotFound.description: We searched high and low, but this page seems to have vanished into thin air.

NoAccess.title: Private Party!
NoAccess.description: Looks like you don't have the secret password for this page. Let's get you back to where you belong.

Empty.title: Nothing to see here... yet!
Empty.description: This space is a blank canvas, waiting for something awesome to be added.

Profile.title: My Profile
Profile.avatar_note: Your avatar is automatically generated from the first letter of your name.
Profile.email_note: Your email is linked to your authentication provider and cannot be changed.
Profile.failure_message: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
Profile.delete_dialog_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
Profile.delete_failure_message: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
Profile.provider_note: Your authentication provider cannot be changed.

Errors.server_error_description: We couldn't load the data. Please try refreshing the page.

CustomIdInput.fixed_info: Enter text or use emoji. This will appear as-is in the ID.
CustomIdInput.date_info: Use: yyyy (year), mm (month), dd (day), ddd (weekday). Add suffix like '-' after.
CustomIdInput.sequence_info: Format: D1-D10 for sequence length. Add suffix like '_' after.
CustomIdInput.random_6digit_info: 6-digit random number. Add optional suffix like '-' after.
CustomIdInput.random_9digit_info: 9-digit random number. Add optional suffix like '_' after.
CustomIdInput.random_20bit_info: Format: X5 (hex) or D6 (decimal). Add suffix like '-' after.
CustomIdInput.random_32bit_info: Format: X8 (hex) or D10 (decimal). Add suffix like '_' after.
CustomIdInput.guid_info: Generate a UUID. Add optional suffix like '-' after.
